featured.text: The first piece was set just high enough so that when it swung out horizontally from the cabinet door, the second piece would swing down from the first, just touching the ground, and so serving as a support for the first piece of the wood.
Using metal hinges, Jeanie attached one piece of the wood to the front of the cabinet door, and the second piece to the first.
The Kiddie Stool will swing out only when the cabinet door opens.
When not in use, the hinges allowed the two pieces of wood to fold back up tightly against the cabinet, where they were held in place by magnets.
It swings from left to right to be attached to the cabinet door.

definition.en_def: A cupboard or storage space with shelves and doors, or a group of high-ranking officials in a government.
definition.example: The kitchen cabinet was filled with dishes and utensils.
